actions: Nourishes Jing and Blood, fills the Marrow and nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin.
With Dang Gui, for Blood Deficiency marked by dizziness, palpitations, insomnia and menstrual dysfunction.
With Gui Ban, for dizziness, insomnia, tinnitus, forgetfulness, afternoon fevers and night sweats due Yin Deficiency with Yang Rising.
Nourishes Yin, anchors Yang, benefits the Kidneys, strengthens the bones, nourishes the Blood, enriches Yin, stabilizes the Chong and Ren channels, cools the Blood and stops uterine bleeding.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness, promotes water metabolism and calms the fetus.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, strengthens and reconnects the sinews and bones. stops uterine bleeding, calms the fetus, prevents miscarriage, promotes the movement of Blood and alleviates pain.
benefits Jing and marrow and warms the Womb.
Cools the Blood and stops bleeding.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold and regulates the menses.
With Shu Di Huang, for Heat symptoms due to Yin Deficiency and Devastated Blood.

syndromes: Kidney Deficiency with Insufficiency of the Chong and Ren

symptoms: Low back and knee soreness and weakness
Profuse or scanty dark Blood with small clots
Distention and pain in the lower abdomen during menstruation
Profuse thick or thin vaginal discharge
